Pre-Game Insights: The game will be played on Wednesday, Jan. 08 at 7:00 pm CT at the Smoothie King Center.
The Pelicans vs. Trail Blazers game can be watched on Gulf Coast Sports & Entertainment Network, and the Trail Blazers game can be watched on KUNP / KATU 2.2.
The Pelicans vs. Trail Blazers have a tied head-to-head record of 39-39 over 78 regular season games.
Pelicans-Trail Blazers Connections: Pelicans Head Coach Willie Green was teammates with Trail Blazers Head Coach Chauncey Billups on the LA Clippers during the 2012-13 season.
Pelicans Coaching Advisor Mike Dâ€™Antoni acted as an assistant coach for the Portland Trail Blazers during the 2000-01 season.
Pelicans Assistant Coach Jarron Collins played for the Trail Blazers in his final season as an active player during the 2010-11 season.
Pelicans G CJ McCollum was drafted by the Trail Blazers with the 10th overall pick in the 2013 NBA Draft.
McCollum (2013-2022) spent nine seasons with the team where he appeared in 564 games and averaged 19.0 points, 3.4 rebounds, and 3.4 assists per game.
Pelicans Player Development Coach Corey Brewer played alongside Trail Blazers F Jerami Grant on the 2017-18 Oklahoma City Thunder.
Blazers C/F Robert Williams III is a native of Shreveport, LA, and played high school basketball for North Caddo in Vivian, LA.
How to Watch Pelicans vs. Trail Blazers: GCSEN will originate in high definition (HD) out of New Orleans through WVUE FOX 8 and will be available in HD across Gray Media markets throughout Louisiana, Mississippi, and Alabama over the air free in all 14 markets.
Free over the air stations require an antenna to access the GCSEN channel listings.
High Definition OTA Channels require a standard HD antenna and Standard Definition OTA Channels require a regular antenna.
How to Live Stream Pelicans vs. Trail Bl: In-market Pelicans fans can watch live and on-demand regular season games from their device with Pelicans+.
Out-of-market Pelicans fans can stream and watch live games with NBA League Pass available on 19 platforms with multiple broadcast options.
Pelicans Pregame & Postgame Live Streams: Catch New Orleans Pelicans head coach Willie Green's Pregame and Postgame interviews plus interviews from Pelicans players on various platforms presented by Caesars Sportsbook.
